Reviews.Title: good price - works great!
Reviews.Author: Bill Lawrence
Reviews.Content: Slightly thicker than Canon battery, but fits fine in cameras that it's designed for.  Seems to have exactly the same charge run-time as the OEM battery, and much more economical ... basically bought '2 for the price of 1'... Nice.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery
Battery Specs: 1400 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Canon NB-11L Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 1400 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery for Canon PowerShot ELPH 115 HS 16 MP Digital Camera and Canon NB-11L
